com.chriswlucas.restaurant

Class PartyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chriswlucas.restaurant.PartyManager

  • public class PartyManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles everything needed to run a party, from start to finish.
    Author:
    Nick Anderson

                int customer)
        Removes an item from the appropriate list (food or drink).
        Parameters:
        item - - a menu item.
        customer - - customer who wants the item removed.

      • makeTicket

        void makeTicket()
        Creates a ticket for the current order and sends out the job.

      • takeOrder

        void takeOrder()
        Takes an order from the customers. Case 0 Takes user through adding an item to the ticket. Case 1 Takes user through removing an item from the ticket. Case 2 Lets user view the current ticket. Case 3 Let the user submit their ticket. Case 4 Lets the user cancel their current ticket.

      • pay

        void pay(int partyID)
        On checkout creates a Payment Manager which will handle creating a receipt and handle sending out jobs to clean and free the table.
